3: How was Vassago able to track us from that far, and that ferocious too? Is it because we gave it a beating once?
Of course, this was Watanabe's plan, to use Vassago's trait... I should've known.
...I think that's not what they really want.
At the time, he insisted on giving a gift to the commandant. It was a box of some strong-smelling wild mint.
It was his plan all along.
I get it now! How could he?! He looked like a harmless middle-aged man!
It's too late now, this is the result of trusting Watanabe.
I won't allow Liv to be endangered any further.
They haven't brought up any terms yet, which means that they're not open for negotiations. I can only see one ending for these situations...
